name: Moon Launcher
description:
Traverse space, dodge asteroids and share your high scores with your friends. How long can you survive the dark but oddly beautiful abyss of space?

In this game, your mission is to get to the moon. And soon when the moon mission begins, there will be many things to discover! 

Updates currently in development including: new maps, animations, enemies, new physics and traversal options, lighting systems and more!

Please let TeamMoonLauncher know what you think of the game!
